channel.title: I need help changing something on the thee underground client
channel.description:
ok well when i log in it has the welcome bot that i cant figure out how to change here is a picture of what i mean [IMG]http://i363.photobucket.com/albums/oo71/dman10345/welcome_bot.jpg[/img] Where do i change what the welcome bot says?
Also Credit to YOUBEEDRED for the client

item.title: I need help changing something on the thee underground client
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

this isn’t client sided… it is all about the server…like i said, the cient has nothing to do with it

Read full topic

item.title: I need help changing something on the thee underground client
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

ok thx man XD[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2009, 06:02:53 pm[/size][hr]djspanke, when i changed the client.class, save it, and compile it, then go back in then it changed back

Read full topic
item.source: I need help changing something on the thee underground client

item.title: I need help changing something on the thee underground client
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

[quote=“djspanke, post:3, topic:269607”]Search your client class for one of those lines

It belongs here as the server needs edited not the client, the client is irelivent[/quote]

This is client sided. That is why it is now in the client help section.

d man103456:

ok thx alot djspanke, i got one more question that u might be able to answer, if im going to release my client for people to play my server. How can i like lock it or something like that. like other people do where there is only the run.bat file or w/e so people can’t edit it XD

Remove the .java files.

Read full topic
